18 import rospy
19 from niryo_robot_system_api_client import system_api_client
20 
21 from niryo_robot_rpi.msg import HotspotButtonStatus
22 
23 from ..common.rpi_ros_utils import play_connected
24 from .mcp_io_objects import McpIOManager
25 
26 
27 class HotspotButton:
28 
29  def __init__(self, mcp_manager):
30  if mcp_manager is None:
31  mcp_manager = McpIOManager()
32 
33  self.__hotspot_led = mcp_manager.add_led(rospy.get_param("~hotspot/led_pin"), "Hotspot Led")
34  self.__hotspot_button = mcp_manager.add_button(rospy.get_param("~hotspot/button_pin"),
35  "Hotspot Button",
36  pullup=True,
37  reverse_polarity=True)
38 
39  self.__hotspot_on = False
40  self.__hotspot_led.off()
41 
42  self.hotspot_state_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1), self.__hotspot_state_callback)
43 
44  self.__button_state_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot/hotspot_button_state',
45  HotspotButtonStatus,
46  queue_size=1)
47 
48  self.__hotspot_button.on_press(self.on_press)
49  self.__hotspot_button.on_release(self.on_release)
50 
51  self.__press_mode = None
52  self.__is_released = False
53 
54  def __del__(self):
55  self.shutdown()
56 
57  def __hotspot_state_callback(self, _):
58  response = system_api_client.hotspot_state()
59 
60  if not response.success:
61  rospy.logwarn_throttle(60, 'Failed to get hotspot state from system api')
62  self.__hotspot_on = False
63  return
64 
65  if self.__hotspot_on != response.data['state']:
66  self.__hotspot_on = response.data['state']
67  if self.__hotspot_on:
68  self.__hotspot_led.on()
69  else:
70  self.__hotspot_led.off()
71 
72  def __set_press_mode(self, elapsed_time):
73  if elapsed_time > 10:
74  self.__press_mode = HotspotButtonStatus.IGNORE_PRESS
75  elif elapsed_time > 7:
76  self.__press_mode = HotspotButtonStatus.LONG_PRESS
77  elif elapsed_time > 0:
78  self.__press_mode = HotspotButtonStatus.SHORT_PRESS
79  else:
80  self.__press_mode = HotspotButtonStatus.IGNORE_PRESS
81  rospy.logwarn(f'User is a time traveler. elapsed time is {elapsed_time}')
82 
83  def __do_action(self):
84  if self.__press_mode == HotspotButtonStatus.IGNORE_PRESS:
85  return
86  elif self.__press_mode == HotspotButtonStatus.LONG_PRESS:
87  self.__reset_network()
88  elif self.__press_mode == HotspotButtonStatus.SHORT_PRESS:
89  self.__swap_hotspot_state()
90 
91  def __swap_hotspot_state(self):
92  if self.__hotspot_on:
93  system_api_client.stop_hotspot()
94  else:
95  system_api_client.start_hotspot()
96 
97  @staticmethod
98  def __reset_network():
99  system_api_client.reset_wifi()
100  system_api_client.reset_ethernet()
101  system_api_client.reset_hotspot()
102  play_connected()
103 
104  def on_press(self):
105  pressed_time = rospy.Time.now()
106  self.__is_released = False
107 
108  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and not self.__is_released:
109  previous_press_mode = self.__press_mode
110  elapsed_time = (rospy.Time.now() - pressed_time).to_sec()
111  self.__set_press_mode(elapsed_time)
112  if self.__press_mode != previous_press_mode:
113  hotspot_button_status = HotspotButtonStatus()
114  hotspot_button_status.mode = self.__press_mode
115  hotspot_button_status.state = HotspotButtonStatus.PRESSED
116  self.__button_state_publisher.publish(hotspot_button_status)
117 
118  def on_release(self):
119  self.__is_released = True
120  hotspot_button_status = HotspotButtonStatus()
121  hotspot_button_status.mode = self.__press_mode
122  hotspot_button_status.state = HotspotButtonStatus.RELEASED
123  self.__button_state_publisher.publish(hotspot_button_status)
124  self.__do_action()
125 
126  def shutdown(self):
127  self.__hotspot_button.disable_on_press()
128  self.__hotspot_button.disable_on_release()
129  self.__hotspot_led.off()
